Detailed Description

Class to provide a DynamicRenderable wrapper for a drawing lines.

void DynamicLines::setOperationType ( OperationType  opType  ) 

Set the type of operation to draw with.

Parameters:
opType opType Can be one of RenderOperation::OT_LINE_STRIP, RenderOperation::OT_LINE_LIST, RenderOperation::OT_POINT_LIST, RenderOperation::OT_TRIANGLE_LIST, RenderOperation::OT_TRIANGLE_STRIP, RenderOperation::OT_TRIANGLE_FAN... The default is OT_LINE_STRIP.
